name: Happy Seal
description:
❓

This game was made in two years as a way to have something cool in my portfolio. I wanted to make a game that was actually fun (the ones that came before this one were'nt really). I've learnt a lot making this and I hope you enjoy playing it. See you in the next one ;)

📃Credits📃:

Game developed by @lorenax

Thumbnail by Ana Morales Pérez ( 📸 @lachica2d)
